pre_text_caption_evidence: interest and penalties with respect to unrecognized tax benefits were $ 3 million as of each of december 31 , 2015 and 2014 .

during 2013 , the company recorded a reduction of $ 14 million to its liability for uncertain tax positions related to a change approved by the irs for the allocation of interest costs to long term construction contracts at ingalls .
this change was made on a prospective basis only and did not impact the tax returns filed for years prior to 2013 .
